TopicTitle: Part 2 of Our Epic Jool Mission

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone. If you didn't see this post, my friend and I started a huge mission to Jool. We are assembling a big ship in Kerbin orbit, which will visit every moon in the Jool system, and attempt to get basically all of its science points. It was a lot of work to plan!

In the first video we accidentally forgot to move a few supports we used to balance the ship. So, here's our correction in part 2. There's some pretty neat docking maneuvers with our trusty tug. And, we continue to make fun of each other

You can visit our channel here. If you like it we'd appreciate a subscribe. Thanks!
